projects.description: The Philips TV Buying Guide: find the Smart TV that’s just right for you. If you’re considering a new tv, making the right choice can seem overwhelming. Philips TV Buying Guide helps you select and buy the perfect tv for your needs. It offers a fun, easy way to select your preferred screen size, budget, design and picture quality, then suggests tvs that match your personal preferences. It even lets you experience your top choices in an interactive room setting using a mobile app. Compare, select and buy your next TV all in one place.
